Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

I am writing this post today because I have just joined the KSP community, and have bought Kerbal Space Program I am currently looking for pro tips and tricks, I have launched into orbit with the Kerbal X and have made my own rocket and landed on the Mun, I know how to use manuvers and more, my next missions are:

Putting a rover on the Mun

Getting to Duna

Help with these would be appreciated or tips

On to me, I am an Australian and I love Minecraft and KSP I do HTML5 and website creation, and I love technology. I have accredits with Apple certifications. Pleased to meet you all!

Thanks guys!

Hey Creeper 5380! Welcome to the forums. I hope you have a nice time here.

Have fun and happy flying!

Dupe post?

What happened? Anyways, welcome.

(I'm betting that a mod will delete/close this thread soon, as it's a dupe, so, yeah.)

Again, welcome to the forums.

Yeah, I wasn't use to the entire,

post approval system, so I thought it didn't process correctly thus I created a new post, I soon found out later that it was a mistake.

Thanks anyway
